sense.def:
To be satisfied with something
pomeni, da smo veseli, ker smo dobili ali dosegli, kar smo želeli.

seg.quote: He was well satisfied with the success of the aircraft.
...satisfied customers who had bought the car.

sense.def:
To be satisfied that something is true or has been done properly
pomeni, da smo preverili dejstva in smo zdaj prepričani, da je nekaj res ali da je bilo tisto primerno narejeno.

seg.quote: We can be satisfied that we've missed nothing important.
